channel.title: Third game type?
channel.description: Is there any talk of an eventual third enemy type? While unseen are focused around killing and cult are focused around conversion, it might be interesting to have a type focused around deception-- fooling BD investigators into killing their own.

item.title: Third game type?
item.dc:creator: FidelCastro
item.description:
Is there any talk of an eventual third enemy type? While unseen are focused around killing and cult are focused around conversion, it might be interesting to have a type focused around deception-- fooling BD investigators into killing their own.
